name: Island Getaway
description: Get away from the real world and warp into your very own virtual island full of activities!This game is being developed side-by-side with the community so make sure to leave suggestions for new activities!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater.
